name: 12 Taps of Christmas - Tap Christmas Days Gifts
name_original: 12 Taps of Christmas - Tap Christmas Days Gifts
description:
12 Taps of Christmas! is the MOST Christmas FUN you will have this Holiday Season. Tap the Cute, Adorable Christmas Icons that pop-up on your mobile phone and tablet. 12 Taps of Christmas! is amazing fun, extremely addictive and keeps you coming back again and again. This is the funnest Christmas game that will keep you tapping all the days of the Holiday season and it is at your finger tips.

Collect as many of these cute christmas icons as you can. There are 3 game to choose from, Easy if you want to play it safe, Advanced when you are looking for a great challenge or play against the clock. But watch out for the Grinch and lumps of coal, but when you see Santa, click on him like crazy to earn bonus tap points.

This is loads of fun, So what are you waiting for. Download and play 12 Taps of Christmas! And give us a 5 Star Rating if you love the game. We would really really appreciate it.
